title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 368-1.4 - References
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 368-1.4 - References

State Regulations

The following documents are incorporated by reference in
this Subpart and are on file with the New York State Department of State. The
documents are available from the Superintendent of Documents, U.S. Government

Printing Office, Washington, DC 20402 and for inspection and copying at the
department's office located at 625 Broadway, Albany, New York 12233. Code of Federal Regulations (CFR): (a) 16 CFR
- Title 16 of the Code of Federal

Regulations (Commercial Practices), Chapter I, Subchapter B, Part 260 Guides
for the Use of Environmental Marketing Claims, section 260.12 Recyclable

Claims, January 1, 2021. (b) 16 CFR
- Title 16 of the Code of Federal Regulations (Commercial Practices), Chapter
I, Subchapter B, Part 260 Guides for the Use of Environmental Marketing Claims, section 260.13 Recycled Content Claims, January 1, 2021. (c) 16 CFR
- Title 16 of the Code of Federal

Regulations (Commercial Practices), Chapter I, Subchapter B, Part 260 Guides
for the Use of Environmental Marketing Claims, section 260.14 Refillable

Claims, January 1, 2021. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
368-1.4

Adopted

New

York State Register February 23, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 08, eff. 3/10/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
